member.name: T:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.EIdentityClient
member.summary: IdentityClient requires loading dlls from %programfiles%\eplan\common\identityClient we have to provide them manually via

member.name: P:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.ProductInfo.ProductVersion
member.summary: ProductVersion. This should include also the buildNumber.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.InitIdentityClient(System.String,Eplan.IdentityClient.ApplicationMode,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Application main ClientId name. E.g. DesktopPlatformWithConsents, HarnessProD
Interactive (with UI) or Batch application mode.
For internal use (parameter is set automatically).
member.remarks: Used when authenticate from outside of EPLAN application environment.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.SetProxy(Eplan.IdentityClient.EProxySettings)
member.remarks: If not used, the system proxy settings are used by default.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.Signin
member.remarks: If not already signed in, a login window will pop out.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.GetUserProfile
member.summary: Gets EPLAN cloud user profile information.
member.remarks: The returned CloudUserProfile object contains information such as DisplayName, OrganizationName, Email etc.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.RegisterClientId(System.String)
member.summary: Registers ClientId of an EPLAN Cloud service.
member.remarks:
By calling this method the internal TokenManagement will know about the client and manage access token for it.
After calling this method, one can utilize the method GetAccessToken or GetHttpClient for the registered client.
Method called also internally by GetHttpClient() method.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.GetAccessToken(System.String)
member.summary: Gets access token for a ClientId.
member.remarks: Method called also internally by GetHttpClient() method.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.GetHttpClient(System.String,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient@)
member.summary: Gets HttpClient object. IHttpClientFactory is used internally to create the HttpClient object.
member.param: URL for which a proxy object will be created and set in the HttpClient object.
Valid HttpClient object if success, otherwise null.
member.remarks: A proxy for the baseAddress and the authorization header to access the EPLAN Cloud service (strClientId) are set by default in the returned HttpClient object. In this way it is ready for use.

member.name: M:Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.IEIdentityClient.SetProductInfo(Eplan.IdentityClient.Authentification.ProductInfo,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.returns: true if product information could be sent to the IdentityClient. Otherwise false.
